pr_title: Handle Ballerina reserved literal name when generating code from proto(1.1.x)

timeline.message: Handle Ballereina reserved literal name when generating code from proto

timeline.bodyText: Isn't it difficult to maintain this in the future as we have to change this array whenever new reserved word is adding to the language? There is a possibility to miss this.
timeline.author: anupama-pathirage

replies.bodyText: Sorry for the noise. Just noticed your comment on requeesting an API.
replies.author: anupama-pathirage
